body:
This PR addresses static analysis failures exposed by fixing the `mypy` configuration. It includes fixes for invalid INI syntax, missing type annotations in scripts, potential runtime crashes in assessment utilities, and explicit type hints for `Player` subclasses in games to ensure correct type inference across module boundaries. All tests and static analysis checks now pass.

---
*PR created automatically by Jules for task [917159439377610175](https://jules.google.com/task/917159439377610175) started by @dieterolson*

title: fix: Resolve mypy configuration and type errors
